type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.VerificationTask
type.description: A VerificationTask is a task which performs some verification of the artifacts produced by a build.

method.name: getIgnoreFailures
method.description:
Specifies whether the build should break when the verifications performed by this task fail.

returns:false, when the build should break on failure, true when the failures should be ignored.

method.name: setIgnoreFailures
method.description:
Specifies whether the build should break when the verifications performed by this task fail.
param:ignoreFailures false to break the build on failure, true to ignore the failures. The default is false.

property.name: ignoreFailures
property.description:
Specifies whether the build should break when the verifications performed by this task fail.

returns:false, when the build should break on failure, true when the failures should be ignored.
